title: Firefox for Android 53.0.1 Release

notes.note:
Fix a crash with the Bluhell Firewall add-on (bug [1354911][1])

[1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1354911

Fix accessibility issue with TalkBack (bug [1332731][1])

[1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1332731

Fix a race condition that could prevent opening restored tabs (bug [1356563][1])

[1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1356563

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
